original: 揚州會稽郡人，東吳官員。會稽郡太守郭誕因未確實上報流言而被問罪入獄，邵疇時任郭誕功曹，為救郭誕，自首頂罪，又自殺以證郭誕清白。
text: A native of Huiji County, Yangzhou, an official of Soochow. Guo Dan, the prefect of Kuaiji County, was questioned and imprisoned for failing to report the rumors. Shao Chou surrendered himself to save Guo Dan and committed suicide to prove Guo Dan’s innocence.
